sentence: At Wildstone, we are committed to upholding ethical and responsible business practices

label: c4m
context: As part of our contracting processes, we include specific prohibitions against the use of forced, compulsory or trafficked labour, or anyone held in slavery or servitude, whether adults or children, and we expect that our contractors, suppliers and other business partners will hold their own suppliers to the same high standards
